field_descriptions.yes_amount: Amount of YES tokens to buy
field_descriptions.no_amount: Amount of NO tokens to buy
field_descriptions.draw_amount: Amount of DRAW tokens to buy
field_descriptions.min_expected_amount: Minimum amount to receive, otherwise revert
field_descriptions.yes_amount_ratio: The share allocated to YES tokens
field_descriptions.no_amount_ratio: The share allocated to YES tokens
field_descriptions.commit: Record the outcome of the event
